message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $11,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,500
